headline: Jack Garfein, 89, Director In Actors Studioâ€™s Heyday
abstract: His family perished in the Holocaust. He survived and went to the United States, where he worked with Ben Gazzara, George Peppard, Samuel Beckett and Arthur Miller.
lead_paragraph: Jack Garfein, a Holocaust survivor who became a noted director, producer and acting teacher, working with some of the greatest actors and playwrights of his era, died on Dec. 30 at a hospital in Manhattan. He was 89.
